titles.title: He led the captives out of the prison,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He led the captives out of the prison,
He preached good tidings unto the weak.
He gave the oil of joy for mourning
He set the captives free,
He set the captives free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will greatly rejoice, rejoice in my God,
My soul shall be joyful, joyful in my God,
He has covered me o'er with the robes of righteousness,
He has clothed me with robes of salvation,
He has clothed me with robes of salvation.
